import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from "react-router" import './EmailSend.css' function EmailSend() { const [mensajeEnviado, setMensajeEnviado] = useState(false); const [form, setForm] = useState(false); const [value, setValue] = useState("") const navigate = useNavigate() if(value.trim() === ""){ alert('mete los campos CASTRON') return } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_k7khs1e', 'template_x6k8b7e', e.target, 'luKgETKyzUKU2Ynic') .then(() => { navigate('') }) setValue("") setMensajeEnviado(true) setForm(true) } return (
